title: Valorization of byproducts from meat and dairy industries through fermentation to produce peptides
content:
Sustainable Food Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4FB00058G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Chih-Chun Kuo, Da Chen, Rafael Jiménez-Flores, Macdonald Wick, Osvaldo Campanella
The escalating global issue of waste streams, particularly within the food industry, necessitates a sustainable approach to valorizing food wastes and incorporating these valorized compounds into new products.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
